title: Stein.world
short_description:
A free-to-play, browser-based online fantasy role 
playing game done in an old-school 
16-bit style.
description:
Stein.world is a free-to-play, browser-based online fantasy role playing game done in an old-school 16-bit style. Built as a persistent world, Stein features hundreds of quests and a vast array of items to collect — including millions of equipment variations as well as mounts and pets.

The game offers plenty of social features, such as group functions, a guild system, a friend’s list. There’s even a housing and farming system. For those really looking for adventure there are dungeons to participate in and a PvP system made up of battlegrounds and open world combat.
